author: Alex Spence
title: This NHS Key Worker Is One Of 21,000 UK Tourists Stranded In New Zealand
description: “There are hundreds of key workers wanting to get home and help the Covid effort,” Jessica Chiodo told BuzzFeed News. View Entire Post ›
content:
Four days ago, Jessica Chiodo made the snap decision to cut short a holiday in New Zealand and return to the UK to join her NHS colleagues on the front lines of the fight against the coronavirus.
Chiodo, a 24-year-old anaesthetic and recovery practitioner at… [+7433 chars]
